verbs.description: A Republican congressman [V: has] asked President Donald Trump to attend the annual congressional baseball game Thursday night at Nationals Park .
[ARG0: A Republican congressman] has [V: asked] [ARG2: President Donald Trump] [ARG1: to attend the annual congressional baseball game Thursday night at Nationals Park] .
A Republican congressman has asked [ARG0: President Donald Trump] to [V: attend] [ARG1: the annual congressional baseball game] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday night] [ARGM-LOC: at Nationals Park] .
